org.springframework.amqp.rabbit.core

Class RabbitManagementTemplate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.amqp.rabbit.core.RabbitManagementTemplate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AmqpManagementOperations
    Deprecated. 
    since 2.1 in favor of direct Client usage.

    @Deprecated
public class RabbitManagementTemplate
extends Object
implements AmqpManagementOperations
    A convenience wrapper for the RabbitMQ Client providing convenient access to the REST methods using the familiar Spring AMQP domain objects for Queue, Exchange and Binding. For more complete access, including access to properties not available in the Spring AMQP domain classes, use the Client directly.
    Since:
    1.5
    Author:
    Gary Russell, Artem Bilan
